p: The jackknife test also showed that precipitation of the coldest quarter (Bio19), precipitation of the driest quarter (Bio17), and precipitation of the driest period (Bio14) were the main variables in the simulation of N. chinensis ( Fig. 5). However, isothermality (Bio3), precipitation seasonality (Bio15), and precipitation of the driest period (Bio14) were the main factors affecting the modeled distribution of N. jatamansi ( Fig. 5).
